sentences.sContent: There are still two vacancies on the school board.
sentences.sCn: 学校董事会还有两个职位空缺。

sentences.sContent: The council is making every effort to fill the vacancies.
sentences.sCn: 地方议会正想方设法填补这些职缺。

synos.tran: 空缺；[电子]空位；空白；空虚

phrases.pCn: 空置率，闲置率；职位空缺比率

remMethod.val: vac(空的) + ancy(表状态， 名词后缀) → 处于空的状态 → 空缺

words.tran: 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的

trans.tranOther: a job that is available for someone to start doing
